dbc2e1863f76e59b4c85c338c0eff407 (19:10): ACTION-54 -- Gregory Rosmaita to work with SteveF draft text for HTML 5 spec to require producers/authors to include @alt on img elements -- due 2008-05-29 -- OPEN
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:11): On the phone I see 60659cfda992013e610f285c46692d28, joshue, a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2, 587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:13): JR: I see the TAG is endorsing Mark N.'s Link: header draft
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:14): "   This document clarifies the status of the Link HTTP header and
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:14): attempts to consolidate link relations in a single registry."
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (19:15): 587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef: proposed +agenda: WG policy on (excessive and unilateral) raising of issues in the WG tracker
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:16): Re: Please add rel="timesheet" Ian Hickson (Wednesday, 28 May)
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:19): DC: getting things into IETF registries is not straightforward
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:19): JR: you don't have to register everything; rel="" takes URI values in Mark N's proposal. HTML could be changed likewise.
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:21): JR: I expect a new draft from Mark N soonish; perhaps best to wait for that.

dbc2e1863f76e59b4c85c338c0eff407 (19:22): ACTION-54 -- Gregory Rosmaita to work with SteveF draft text for HTML 5 spec to require producers/authors to include @alt on img elements -- due 2008-05-29 -- OPEN
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:23): Joshue: folks have been busy so we're behind where we expected to be.
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:23): 587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef: I don't see much urgency; I don't think anybody is waiting for it; I just see deadlock.
ab767e71541a608a50222d997d800063 (19:23): We may have collated the feedback and be able to produce a doc for the Wg by next week
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:24): sees 2 items remaining on the agenda:
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:25): MS: html 5 looks ready to go middle of next week; I have a thorough changelog
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:25): MS: and the Anne's diffs document is ready too
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:25): MS: and the Offline Web Apps intro is ready to go tomorrow
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:29): MS: Gregory added 9 items to tracker; they look more like proposals than issues.
587bf8b858e15d03428e1415c33c38ef (19:30): -> http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/public-html-wg-issue-tracking/2008May/0003.html discretion in adding issues  Dan Connolly (Thursday, 29 May)
